mapper.select: select a.* from ( select sgt.*,sg.title as gambit_title,ur.name as create_name from user_resident as ur,sys_gambit_theme as sgt LEFT JOIN sys_gambit as sg on sgt.gambit_id = sg.id and sg.is_delete = 1 where ur.id = sgt.create_id and sgt.is_delete = 1 order by sgt.create_date DESC ) as a where a.is_public = 1 or a.create_id = #{id}

select sgtc1.*,ur1.name as create_name,ur2.name as parent_name from user_resident as ur1 , sys_gambit_theme_comment as sgtc1 LEFT JOIN sys_gambit_theme_comment as sgtc2 on sgtc1.parent_id = sgtc2.id LEFT JOIN user_resident as ur2 on sgtc2.create_id = ur2.id where sgtc1.gambit_theme_id = #{ThemeId} and sgtc1.create_id = ur1.id and sgtc1.is_delete = 1 order by sgtc1.create_date DESC
select * from sys_gambit where is_public = 1 and is_delete = 1 order by create_date DESC
select SUM(likes) from sys_gambit_theme where gambit_id = 1 and is_delete = 1 group by id
select count(*) from sys_gambit_theme_comment where gambit_id = #{id} and is_delete = 1
select * from sys_gambit_theme where create_id = #{id} and is_delete =1 order by create_date DESC
select ur.id,ur.name from sys_gambit_theme_like as sgtl,user_resident as ur where sgtl.create_id = ur.id and gambit_theme_id = #{id}

select sgt.*,sg.title as gambit_title,ur.name as create_name from user_resident as ur,sys_gambit_theme as sgt LEFT JOIN sys_gambit as sg on sgt.gambit_id = sg.id and sg.is_delete = 1 where sgt.create_id = ur.id and sgt.is_delete = 1 and sgt.id = #{themeId}
